# Getting Started

## Install and launching R packages

The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse package are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

## Importing the data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

# Plotting a simple bar chart

(#\| echo:false=don't show code) (#\| eval:false=don't show graph)

```{r}
ggplot(data = exam_data,aes(x=RACE))+
  geom_bar()
```
